title: 107_hr1061
content: Consumer Banking Services Costs Assessment Act of 2001- Amends the Financial Institutions Reform, Recovery, and Enforcement Act of 1989 to require the Board of Governors of the Federal Reserve System to obtain and report to Congress annually on a representative sample of enumerated retail banking services and products offered by insured depository institutions and credit unions, including related fees and minimum balances, as well as electronic transactions.
